description:
High school kid Takumi works at a gas station with his buddy Itsuki. When the guys join their co-worker Iketani for a night of street racing action on Mt. Akina, Takumi’s life will never be the same.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ACT.1 究極のとうふ屋ドリフト
La superderrapada en el Monte Akina
